title: Generate REDCap Project Diagram — REDCap_diagram
text: Generates diagram REDCap project structure based `project` object.

title: Generate REDCap Project Diagram — REDCap_diagram
code: REDCap_diagram(   project,   static = FALSE,   render = TRUE,   duplicate_forms = TRUE,   clean_names = TRUE,   include_fields = FALSE,   include_choices = FALSE,   hierarchical = FALSE,   direction = "LR" )

title: Generate REDCap Project Diagram — REDCap_diagram
text: project project object REDCapSync package static Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, generates static diagram `DiagrammeR`. FALSE, generates interactive diagram `visnetwork`. Default `FALSE`. render Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, renders diagram. Default `TRUE`. duplicate_forms Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, includes duplicate form nodes diagram. Default `TRUE`. clean_names Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, cleans names forms fields diagram. Default `TRUE`. include_fields Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, includes fields diagram. Default `FALSE`. include_choices Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, includes choices diagram. Default `FALSE`. hierarchical Logical (TRUE/FALSE). TRUE, generates hierarchical diagram. Default `FALSE`. direction Character string specifying direction diagram. Options "LR" (left right), "TB" (top bottom), "RL" (right left), "BT" (bottom top). Default "LR".

title: Generate REDCap Project Diagram — REDCap_diagram
text: diagram object representing REDCap project structure.

title: Generate REDCap Project Diagram — REDCap_diagram
text: function generates visual diagram REDCap project structure, including forms, fields, choices. supports various options rendering diagram, including fields choices, specifying direction diagram.

See enableBookmarking() information bookmarking app. uiPattern regular expression applied GET request determine whether ui used handle request. Note entire request path must match regular expression order match considered successful. options Named options passed runApp call (can following: "port", "launch.browser", "host", "quiet", "display.mode" "test.mode"). can also specify width height parameters provide hint embedding environment ideal height/width app. ... arguments pass golem_opts.
